Name: amh-muhammedsadiqan-la
Author: Muhammed Sadiq And Muhammed Sani Habib

Translations.Text: yihi mets’ihafi (ke’alahi lemehonu) t’irit’iri yelebetimi፤ leferahiyani meri newi፡፡
leneziya beruk’u negeri yemiyaminu solatinimi denibuni t’ebik’ewi yemisegidu keset’enachewimi sisayi yemicheru lehonuti፤
le’ineziyami wede anite beteweredewina ke’anite befitimi beteweredewi yemiyaminu bemech’ereshayitumi (‘alemi) inerisu yemiyaregagit’u lehonuti (meri newi)፡፡
ineziya kegetachewi bememerati layi nachewi፤ ineziyami inesu filagotachewini yagenyu nachewi፡፡
